abstract: New York City Correction Department reports significant drop in serious injuries due to use of physical force on inmates at Rikers Island jail complex in first half of 2016; announcement comes more than year after federal monitors began overseeing city jails in in attempt to curb violence and dysfunction at Rikers.
lead_paragraph: The New York City Correction Department on Tuesday heralded a substantial drop in Rikers Island officers’ use of physical force on inmates resulting in serious injuries in the first half of the year.

headline.main: City Report Suggests Progress in Effort to Curb Violence at Rikers Island
headline.print_headline: Report Signals Progress in Push to Curb Rikers Violence
